Gaano ka kadalas nakakaramdam ng pagod na walang dahilan?
Gaano ka kadalas nakakaramdam ng nerbyos?
Gaano kadalas mong naramdaman ang pagkaba na hirap ng mapigilan?
Gaano ka kadalas nakaramdam na wala ng pagasa?
Gaano kadalas kang nakaramdam na pagkabalisa?
Gaano ka kadalas nakakaramdam ng pagkabalisa na hirap at hindi na mapakali?
Gaano kadalas kang nakakaramdam ng depresyon?
Gaano mo kadalas naramdaman na ang lahat ay isang pagsisikap?
Gaano kadalas ka nalulungkot na walang makapagpapasaya sa iyo?
Gaano kadalas mong nararamdam ang pagiging walang kwenta?
Mahitungod sa unsa ka sagad nimo gibati ang kakapoy sa walay igong rason?
Unsa ka sagad gibati nimo ang kakulba?
Unsa ka subsob nga gibati nimo ang hilabihang kakulba nga walay makapakalma kanimo?
Unsa ka subsob nga gibati nimo ang pagkawalay paglaum?
Unsa ka subsob ang imong gibati nga dili mahimutang o way tulog?
Unsa ka subsob ang imong gibati nga dili mahimutang nga dili ka mulihok?
Unsa ka subsob nga gibati nimo ang depresyon?
Unsa ka sagad imong gibati nga ang tanan kinahanglan ka maningkamot?
Unsa ka subsob ang imong gibating kaguol nga walay makapalipay kanimo?
Unsa ka subsob nga gibati nimo nga wala kay gamit?
You’re doing well—keep it up! Stay active, connect with others in our feed, and keep up the self-care, but don’t forget to check in our daily mood tracker regularly!
You may want to try adopting stress-management techniques like journaling and exercising, and make sure to explore our self-care tips for more support!

It seems like youre having a tough time—remember, its okay to seek support. Consider using our "Seek Professional" feature to connect with a mental health professional for coping strategies. Talking to a friend or family member can also provide comfort.

We highly recommend seeking help from a mental health professional. Book an appointment in our "Seek Professional" feature. If youre in urgent need of support, our care hotline is available for immediate assistance. Reaching out now can help you better manage your mental health and prevent further challenges down the road

Your responses indicate a strong sense of well-being and resilience. Continue to engage in activities that support your mental health, and consider sharing your strategies with others who might benefit
You appear to be managing well, but some areas could benefit from attention. Explore ways to enhance your coping mechanisms and strengthen social connections.

Your responses suggest a balance in your well-being, but there may be underlying issues to address. Reflect on what aspects of your life bring you joy and consider making small adjustments to enhance your overall satisfaction

It seems you are facing challenges that may be affecting your mental health. It’s important to identify specific stressors and seek support, whether through friends, family, or mental health professionals

Your responses indicate significant distress. Please prioritize seeking professional help. Addressing these feelings early can lead to better outcomes, and support is available to help you navigate this difficult time
